rows.asset-name:
Pharma Partners, LLC
                                        
                                        
                                        
                                            
                                                
                                                    Company: Pharma Partners, LLC

                                                Description: The LLC funds research and clinical trials on a new class of drugs, metalloporphyrins. The lead drugs are BMX-010 and BMX-001.
